TopicTitle: Sending a full-sized aircraft carrier to an exoplanet

Articles.Content: So somebody in a discord server I'm in made a ridiculous challenge to send an aircraft carrier to an exoplanet... ...and I did it.  Here's what happened with no trolling or cursedness at all:
This is the most Kerbal thing that has ever Kerballed. Even more so than Manley Scott's Planeject Orion
